src_original: taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi /  ayaṃ pi dharmo prātideśaniko //
taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi /  ayaṃ pi dharmo prātideśaniko //
tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?  dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
[VII. sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmāḥ]  ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
